text:
Email between Vincent and Thomas.
=================================

>>>>> "VH" == Vincent Hardy <vhardy@eng.sun.com> writes:

VH> I think the feOffset bridge omits to take the primitiveUnits into
VH> account. That is, the dx/dy values are not handled differently
VH> depending on the filter primitive units. I think this is an
VH> oversight, but I would like to get your opinion before before
VH> making the change.

    Yes, I believe you are correct.  As I recall this is actually a
wider spread problem, many of the filters didn't take primitive Units
into account.  Perhaps most of these have been fixed...
creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
